scripts.build:sass: npm run build:sass:login && npm run build:sass:account
scripts.build:sass:login: mkdirp evaka/login/resources/css && npm run build:sass:shared -- evaka/login/resources/css/shared.css && npm-sass sass/login/index.scss > evaka/login/resources/css/hs-login.css
scripts.build:sass:account: mkdirp evaka/account/resources/css && npm run build:sass:shared -- evaka/account/resources/css/shared.css && npm-sass sass/account/index.scss > evaka/account/resources/css/hs-account.css
